task_description: Enhance Plone REST API agent skills to comprehensively cover ALL Usage and Endpoints chapters from official documentation. Skills must support both backend development (Python/Plone) and client development (JavaScript/TypeScript/Python).

patterns.skill_frontmatter: YAML with name and description containing trigger keywords
patterns.endpoint_tables: | Endpoint | Method | Description | format grouped by category
patterns.code_examples: Complete, runnable code with imports - both JS/TS and Python
patterns.reference_files: Advanced implementation examples, CLI tools, framework integrations

potential_gaps: Need to verify against official docs chapters
Need to verify ALL endpoints from official docs

critical_constraints: btca used ONLY during implementation - NOT in final skill content
Both JavaScript/TypeScript AND Python examples required
Must verify coverage against ALL Plone REST API documentation chapters
